Articles.Content:
Is there anyone who could make Launch Escape System that could be attached to a side of a part, instead on top of it? It would be very helpful for many Kerbals in case of decoupler-less SSTO planes (SSTO's based on B9 S3 and HL fuselages).

Please, would any of you moding magicans try to make it?

They're already in the game... They're called Sepratrons.

I don't understand how you'd want to use a LES without a decoupler, though. The whole principle of the tower is to drag away the capsule.

Also maybe you would use individual chutes of Vanguard mod instead.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25305-0-25-Vanguard-Technologies-EVA-parachutes-23!-24!-25!-%28Dec-30%29

Pressing Backspace throws all Kerbals from the craft, pressing Space+F opens their chutes.
